column2:
• Active and passive cooling configurations
  • DirectX 11 and 3D stereoscopic display
  • Hardware acceleration for MPEG-2, MPEG-4, WMV9, VC-1 and H.264 video
  • Support for up to 16GB of DDR3 at speeds up to 1333MHz
  • Rich connectivity options with support for 2 HDMI ports, one VGA port and two 18/24-bit LVDS
  • Supports dual Gigabit Ethernet, three USB 3.0 and six USB 2.0 ports
  • Four COM ports and support for SD (SDXC/SDHC)
  • Available with ATX or DC-in power supply support
  • Ready for Windows 8, Windows 7/WES7/ XP, and Linux OS & driver support
  • Designed for advanced Industrial Automation, POS, Kiosk, ATM, Gaming, Digital Signage, Healthcare and Digital Media Applications

Tags: VIA Digital Signage Solutions, Mini-ITX.

• Active and passive cooling configurations
  • Hardware acceleration for MPEG-2, WMV9, VC-1 and H.264 video
  • Support for up to 8GB of DDR3
  • On board HDMI and VGA ports, plus two 18/24-bit LVDS
  • Supports dual Gigabit Ethernet, eight USB 2.0 ports
  • Eight COM ports (expandable to 12 with the VIA LPC-01/02 add-on card)
  • Available with ATX or DC-in power supply support
  • Designed for advanced Industrial Automation, POS, Kiosk, ATM, Gaming, Digital Signage, Healthcare and Digital Media Applications

Tags: VIA Kiosk Solutions, VIA Healthcare Solutions, Mini-ITX,
accessories, AMOS-1000 (chassis)

• High-performance 64-bit VIA QuadCore E-Series or VIA Nano® X2 E-Series dual core processor
  • Hardware acceleration for VC1, H.264 and WMV9 HD video
  • On board HDMI and VGA ports, plus dual channel 24-bit LVDS
  • Support for up to 8GB of DDR3
  • Support for HD DVD and  Blu-ray audio content protection
  • Supports two SATA, one Gigabit Ethernet (optional for one more), eight USB 2.0 ports, four COM ports
  • Supports PCI and PCIe slot
  • Supports one VGA, one HDMI and one dual-channel 24-bit LVDS panel

• Compact 10cm x 7.2cm Pico-ITX form factor

  • 4GB on-board eMMC Flash memory, supports up to 64GB
  • 1GB high performance DDR3 SDRAM onboard
  • Supports three independent integrated graphics processing units(GPU) for 2D/3D graphics acceleration for dual displays
